name: Jalapeno-Cilantro Ranch Dip
author: undertheliveoaktrees
summary: Cool, herby, slightly spicy dip. Perfect with tortilla chips, mixed into guacamole, or on tacos. Refrigerate for up to 1 week. Can be frozen and then defrosted in the fridge, but the texture changes slightly -- it's best fresh.
ingredients: 3  jalapeno peppers, seeded and roughly chopped
1 (1 ounce) package dry ranch dressing mix
directions: Combine sour cream, cilantro, mayonnaise, jalapenos, and ranch dressing mix in a blender
Pulse until cilantro and peppers are finely minced and incorporated
You might need to stir with a spatula a few times to make sure everything's fully mixed
